channel.title: Bible Essentials
channel.description: This podcast is meant to help you understand the Bible in a much simpler way. It discusses critical themes in the Bible that all lead up to Jesus Christ, the center of the whole Bible.
channel.itunes:author: Kofi Adu-Boateng

item.title: Jesus: Walking on Water
item.itunes:title: Jesus: Walking on Water
item.description: Welcome to Season 2 of this podcast! This season is titled “Lessons from the Savior.” In this season, we will look at the parables Jesus taught, and the miraculous wonders He showed, and talk about some of the lessons we can take away from them. So, let’s start off with when Jesus walked on water!
item.content:encoded: Welcome to Season 2 of this podcast! This season is titled “Lessons from the Savior.” In this season, we will look at the parables Jesus taught, and the miraculous wonders He showed, and talk about some of the lessons we can take away from them. So, let’s start off with when Jesus walked on water!

item.title: The Light
item.itunes:title: The Light
item.description: In chapter 8 of the book of John, Jesus Christ declared that He was the light of the world. But, what did He mean by “the light?” Keep listening to find out!
item.content:encoded: In chapter 8 of the book of John, Jesus Christ declared that He was the light of the world. But, what did He mean by “the light?” Keep listening to find out!
item.itunes:subtitle: In chapter 8 of the book of John, Jesus Christ declared that He was the light of the world. But, what did He mean by “the light?” Keep listening to find out!

item.itunes:author: pastorkofi101

item.title: The Day of the Lord
item.itunes:title: The Day of the Lord
item.description: When someone mentions the Day of the Lord, we think of many things like God's judgment, the Apocalypse, Jesus's Second Coming, and so on. So, let’s look at the biblical message of the Day of the Lord!
item.content:encoded: When someone mentions the Day of the Lord, we think of many things like God's judgment, the Apocalypse, Jesus's Second Coming, and so on. So, let’s look at the biblical message of the Day of the Lord!
item.itunes:subtitle: When someone mentions the Day of the Lord, we think of many things like God's judgment, the Apocalypse, Jesus's Second Coming, and so on. So, let’s look at the biblical message of the Day of the Lord!

item.itunes:author: pastorkofi101

item.title: The Test
item.itunes:title: The Test
item.description: Everyone has to make tough choices in their lives daily, which could impact their future permanently. What can we learn from the biblical theme of the test? Listen to this episode to find out!
item.content:encoded: Everyone has to make tough choices in their lives daily, which could impact their future permanently. What can we learn from the biblical theme of the test? Listen to this episode to find out!

item.title: The Water of Life
item.itunes:title: The Water of Life
item.description: What does Jesus mean when He says that He is the Water of Life (Living Water)? And what did He mean when He said that we can drink from Him? Keep listening to find out!
item.content:encoded: What does Jesus mean when He says that He is the Water of Life (Living Water)? And what did He mean when He said that we can drink from Him? Keep listening to find out!

item.title: The Door
item.itunes:title: The Door
item.description: What does Jesus mean when He said that He was the door? Watch this episode to find out!

item.title: The Son Of Man
item.itunes:title: The Son Of Man
item.description: Jesus calls Himself the Son of Man, but what does that even mean? And where does that name come from? Listen to this episode to find out!
item.content:encoded: Jesus calls Himself the Son of Man, but what does that even mean? And where does that name come from? Listen to this episode to find out!

item.title: Image of God
item.itunes:title: Image of God
item.description: What does it mean to be an "image of God?" Listen to this episode to find out!
